posts.message: Windows 8.1 Update 1 released, now available for download
posts.caption: www.neowin.net
posts.description: Microsoft has released Windows 8.1 update 1 on Windows update which brings new features for mouse and keyboard users to the Windows 8 platform including app pinning and new context menus.

posts.message:
Scott Hanselman just blogged about this .NET Library:
http://humanizr.net/
It's a library for manipulating and displaying strings, enums, dates, times, timespans, numbers and quantities.
The amount of awesome functionalities is just too much :)
and as an added bonus, it has Arabic Localization! (the developer seems to be from Arab descent)

posts.message:
Why is Rundll32 called Rundll32 and not just Rundll?

http://blogs.msdn.com/b/oldnewthing/archive/2014/04/08/10515006.aspx
posts.caption: blogs.msdn.com
posts.description: There is an oft-abused program named rundll32.exe. Why does its name end in 32? Why not just call it rundll.exe? (I will for the moment ignore the rude behavior of calling people stupid under the guise of asking a question.)
